background.story: Born the second daughter of the ShadowHilt family, Erze also chose to become a vampire hunter after her beloved sister Seria. Erze's feeble frame kept her from learning how to fight with swords, but she managed to become known as a hunter with her talents in magic. One day she fell into a trap during an operation and was bitten by a mysterious vampire on the shoulder. Her weak constitution grew worse, and she suffered from frequent headaches and thirst every night. Erze knew what this meant and what would end up happening to her. She hid the bite and tried to find a cure on her own, distancing herself from her comrades in her efforts. Meanwhile, Seria was dispatched to Windland Snow Mountain to investigate the Vampire Princess that went missing 100 years ago. On the day her sister left... - Ahh, Seria... I cannot control it anymore... Erze quietly and secretly started slitting the throats of her comrades.

itemIntroductions.weapon: When did this all begin...? This torment that comes with unending thirst... But after quenching that thirst... My heart throbs with burning hatred against you, Seria......Ah, Seria. I have no other choice. I need this power to satisfy this endless thirst. This ever-flowing essence of power is the only cure to my eternal torment. Ah... This ecstasy... More... Someone, thrill me more.
itemIntroductions.soul:
When Erze was presented with eternal thirst by the vampires, she instead killed them and absorbed their power. Perion, an essence created by this incident, was a small and weak sphere then.
However, Erze's hidden talent transformed this sphere into an item that cycles itself to quench Erze's eternal thirst, and manifest the quenched thirst in a form of greed and strength.
Her thirst exacerbated boundlessly, and eventually, even her mixed feeling toward her sister started to seep into the vortex of an endless cycle. Perion decided to aid Erze, and now it attempts to break its vessel to reborn into a new form.
treasures: A fang of the Vampire that bit Erze. After Erze gained the power of blood that she had been craving, she went to this Vampire, brutally murdered it, and took its fang. When the moon is full, she would fiddle with the fang that once had her blood smeared on it, thinking of the past when she used to be a human, before she suffered from the violent thirst for blood.

A wine made by Erze herself with the blood of fallen priests. One of her greatest pleasures is forcing those once considered holy to kneel before her. Inside the bottle is a bloody cross, and those who hear Erze drinking the wine off it shiver and tremble as the sound of the cross clanging inside.

A dark red lipstick made from the blood of those who died disgraceful deaths. The ones who abandoned their dignity as humans and caved in to their insatiable desires failed to escape Erze's grasp. They died while in a complete trance state, but perhaps they might still feel happy about being used by Erze. Erze uses it to leave a mark on the neck of her prey after she has fed on them.

A piano played by Erze on the Festival of Blood held on full moon's night. When her unquenchable thirst for blood finally settled down after razing a peaceful town to the ground, she found herself standing in complete silence on the blood-soaked ground. There was not a life that did not belong to her, and it made her want to play a beautiful tune for her silent audience. The sonata echoed around, over the mountain of dead bodies.
